column6: p.r.; C.k.; obs. O$_3^{-}$; [O$^-$] = 8.4 × 10$^{-8}$; most direct method but substantial amount of O$_2^{\cdot-}$ present by comparison with spectra in [82A133]; not reliable; rel. to k(O$^{\cdot-}$ + O$_2$).
p.r.; C.k. with Fe(CN)$_6^{4-}$; est. based on numerous assumptions; pK($^{\cdot}$OH) = 11.9. Not reliable.; rel. to k($^{\cdot}$OH + Fe(CN)$_6^{4-}$).

p.r.; D.k. at 430 nm (O$_3^-$) as well as simultaneous buildup at 250 nm (O$_2^{\cdot-}$) and decay, in soln. satd. with $4 \times 10^8$ N m$^{-2}$ N$_2$O and 0-1 $\times 10^6$ N m$^{-2}$ O$_2$; computer simulation.
